com.iopipe.plugin.trace

Class TraceUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.iopipe.plugin.trace.TraceUtils

  • public final class TraceUtils
extends Object
    This is a convenience class which contains static methods for creating marks and measurements without needing to obtain the instance of the tracing plugin execution state and performing executions on that.
    Since:
    2018/01/30

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static TraceMeasurement measure(IOpipeExecution __exec, String __name)
      Creates a new instance of a class which is used to measure how long a block of code has executed for.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Method Detail

      • measure

        public static TraceMeasurement measure(IOpipeExecution __exec,
                                       String __name)
                                throws NullPointerException
        Creates a new instance of a class which is used to measure how long a block of code has executed for. The returned object is AutoCloseable and it is highly recommended to use try-with-resources when utilizing it. When the method AutoCloseable.close() is called the measurement will be recorded. The measurement is returned and added to the report if the plugin is enabled.
        Parameters:
        __exec - The single execution state.
        __name - The name of the measurement.
        Returns:
        The measurement which was added to the report, null is returned if the plugin is not enabled
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - On null arguments.
        Since:
        2018/01/30
